content.rendered:
Your Brand’s Safety is our Top Priority.

Nowadays, the safety of your brand has become more and more essential in today’s competitive market. At Trademark India, we honor the fact that your brand is your image, your goodwill, and your toil. The protection of your brand is our main goal and that is why we have made it the first thing to look upon. We are determined to provide excellent quality, low cost, and quick trademark registration of India. We want to apply the state of the arts of technology towards the protection of your brand in public domain across the country.

We are a team of legal professionals and technology enthusiasts who have joined forces to turn the way in which trademarks are registered in India. Together with the contribution of top-level technology, as well as the legal field, we have introduced an online trademark registration India platform that not only eliminates the unnecessarily long and complicated aspects of the process but also brings the promise of being fast, unproblematic, and secure.

Trademarks Registered
0 +
Cases Sorted
0 +
Team Members
0 +

What Our Companions Mean by ‘Next-Gen Legal Solutions’

Innovative Technology Integration

The modern world of a high speed of digitalization, technology is not an option but a must. Trademark India has implemented modern technological tools in the trademark registration in India to turn it into a competitive weapon. The systems we employ – all API based – cut down on paperwork to quite an incredible extent; the filing systems, as well the drafting, entails a least, manual, work from start till the end. This allows our legal specialists to focus on what truly matters: providing sophisticated legal services to guard your brand and perform legal services to the highest level

Our online trademark registration service capitalises on the technologies that allow businesses to protect their ideas and brands across India at a time and convenience of their choosing.

Tailored Human Expertise

Still, we embrace technology to make our work faster knowing that each brand is unique and should be handled individually. This blend of leading-edge technology with specially formulated human advice guarantees that you get the personal attention that your brand requires. At Trademark India, we are considered among the top trademark consultants in India online, we claim that we simplify the legal jargon associated with trademarks and patents for clients to easily understand.

We believe in providing quality services with our team of trademark consultants in India for safeguarding your brand’s prized possessions.

Why We Stand Out

To register a trademark is an area which requires the knowledge of the legal procedures and the application of strategies for protecting your brand. Trademark India offers a wide range of services to make the process of registering trademarks in India easier.

Expert Guidance
Our team comprises professionals with experience in trademark law and registration procedures. We assist you at every stage to ensure your application is accurate. Has the chance of being approved.
Efficient Process
Recognizing the value of time in business we have optimized our processes to expedite the filing and processing of your trademark application thus reducing any delays.
Transparent Pricing
We like to be transparent, hence our reasonable pricing with no hidden agendas. It is our goal to provide competitive pricing whilst making sure your brand interests are never compromised.
Personalized Service
Every business is unique, so why would their needs? Whether it is a new product or you wish to renew the existing one, we provide customized services with all your requirements.

Where are we based?

    Delhi-NCR

      Mumbai

        Kolkata

          Hyderabad

            Ahmedabad

              Chandigarh

                Pune

                  Vizag

                  What Our Clients Are Saying

                  Best Patent Lawyer in Ahmedabad Great help for us in filing our Design registrations from the Indian Patent Office and getting it done ✅
                  Dr Abhijeet Salunke
                  I am happy to share that their services are up to the mark thank you for helping me with my Trademark.
                  Alankar Haikerwal
                  Have been working with them for almost a decade. Hands down one of the best lawyers in the city for IP and copyright law. Very friendly and approachable, if you are not clear about anything, they will explain things to you properly.
                  Brahmmjyot Singh Kalsi
                  I've connected with many law firms but they've provided me with the best legal services ever very professional
                  Akshat Chhapia
                  The best company I came across for IPR-related works. What a passionate group of people working over there, to make our needs meet. The work was done in a jiffy. I gave my documents and within no time it was executed... Kudos to the efforts and hard work of a Great Teamwork
                  Kanvesh Bagrecha
                  Top-notch trademark legal service! Their expertise made my trademark registration a breeze. Professional, responsive, and reliable throughout. Highly satisfied with their assistance
                  Jinay Shah
                  Extraordinary work by Trademarkindia and the team. Super duper fast processing and accurate. A sure-shot place for trademark registration and intellectual property rights filing. At the same time very economical as compared to other firms. Very good experience.
                  Dr Piyush Borkhatariya
                  Excellent services for your trademark registration from start to end. The staff is also very disciplined and helpful.
                  Shruti Raval
                  One of the extraordinary legal services providers. I think this firm has all kind of solutions for our legal problems or questions 100% Satisfaction 100% follow-up work And absolutely transparency
                  Rohit Raval
                  Trademarkindia is the best service provider in, Trademark, Copyright, Patent and all Legal matters. Their way of working is different and unique which gives them a different identity in this industry.
                  Chandan Shukla
                  Trademarkindia is indeed a good mentor/guide for IPR-related work. interaction with him was truly informative, value-based in the realm of patent/copyright
                  Jay Dabhi
                  IF YOU ARE IN BUSINESS AND IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR BRAND NAME SAFE GO FOR IT Vast knowledge and experience of trademark and copyright facilities. Easy to understand the process of trademarking with them The fulfilment of the promise is always on time. Staff is evenly hardworking and passionate about their work.
                  Qrative Care
                  I have come across Trademarkindia for my already filed pending Trademarks but after giving work to them, I got all my TM and copyright registered
                  GREENCON INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED (AMIT KUMAR SHARMA)
                  Previous
                  Next
